resources.string:
Step 1.
Mix up the cards. 

Step 2.
Lay them in rows, face down. 

Step 3.
Turn over any two cards. 

Step 4.
If the two cards match, keep them. 

Step 5.
If they don't match, turn them back over. 

Step 6.
Remember what was on each card and where it was. 

Step 7.
Watch and remember during the other player's turn. 

Step 8.
The game is over when all the cards have been matched. 

Step 9.
The player with the most matches wins. 

Step 10.
Have fun

You Start the game with a set of mixed cards facing down, you can turn over any two cards, If the two cards match, keep them, if they don\'t match turn them back over. \n\n Make sure to remember what was on each card and where it was before you turn them back down, The game is over when all the cards have been matched.
